DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate whether drug-drug interaction multiple dose canagliflozin ( JNJ-28431754 ) single dose oral contraceptive contain ethinyl estradiol levonorgestrel . The safety tolerability canagliflozin also assess healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Effects Canagliflozin ( JNJ-28431754 ) Pharmacokinetics Safety Oral Contraceptive Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This study open-label ( volunteer study staff know identity assign treatment ) , single-center , fixed-sequence study ( volunteer receive medication day ) , determine canagliflozin ( drug currently investigate treatment type 2 diabetes mellitus ) affect pharmacokinetics ( ie , body affect drug ) oral contraceptive contain ethinyl estradiol levonorgestrel . The study consist 3 phase ; screen phase , open-label treatment phase , end-of-study ( follow-up ) phase . Each volunteer participate study approximately 33 day .
DOC.criteria: Volunteer must body mass index ( weight [ kg ] /height [ m2 ] ) 18 30 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) , body weight less 50 kg Volunteer must nonsmoker ( use tobacco nicotine product 6 month ) History currently active illness consider clinically significant Investigator illness Investigator considers exclude patient study could interfere interpretation study result History , presence , disorder commonly accept contraindication sex hormonal therapy contraindication therapy combine oral contraceptive Volunteer use , currently use , hormonal contraceptive within 30 day admission study center receive Depo Provera ( combine contraceptive injection hormonal contraceptive implant ) 6 month prior screen Volunteer breastfeeding
